00019 #define BkColor BLACK
00020 #define FgColor YELLOW

00026 void disp_init(void){
00027     //**** Hardware ****
00028     #ifndef USE_AUTOINIT
00029         glcdDisplayInit();
00030     #endif
00031 
00032     #ifdef DISP_SPLASH
00033         disp_load_bitmap();
00034     #else
00035         disp_clean();
00036     #endif
00037 
00038     glcd_Flags.AutoLineFeed = 0;
00039     glcdSelectFont(f8x11, 0); // font is stored in FLASH, thus no need for own read callback
00040     fdevopen(glcdPut,NULL,0);
00041 
00042     //window for text-output
00043     glcd_Window.X1 = 5;
00044     glcd_Window.X2 = 110;
00045     glcd_Window.Y1 = 16;
00046     glcd_Window.Y2 = 162;
00047 }

00051 void disp_off(void){
00052     //glcdDisplayInit(); ??????????????????????????????
00053 
00054     bk_LED(1);
00055     //for(uint32_t x=0; x < 5000000; x++) asm("nop");
00056 
00057     //clean
00058     glcdSetAddr(0,0, 131, 175);   // set RAM access pointer of display
00059     //width and height also defined in header
00060     for(uint8_t x = 0; x < 132; x++){
00061         for(uint8_t y = 0; y < 176; y++){
00062             glcdPutPixel(WHITE);
00063         }
00064     }
00065     for(uint32_t x=0; x < 500000; x++) asm("nop");
00066     glcdDisplayOff();
00067     glcdWait(100);
00068 }

00070 void disp_refresh(void){
00071     disp_menu();
00072     menu_mains[menu_now-1].disp_func();
00073     disp_prop();
00074 }
00075 
00077 void disp_menu(void){
00078     static int8_t main_old = 0;
00079 
00080     //*** left ***
00081     if(menu_now != main_old){
00082         main_old = menu_now;
00083         disp_clean();
00084 
00085 
00086         glcdFillRect(0,0,132,13,ShColor); //shadow color for menu bg
00087         #define SPACELEFT 6
00088         for(uint8_t x=0; x < MENU_ANZ_MAIN; x++){
00089             if(menu_now == (x+1)){
00090                 glcdFillRect(SPACELEFT+x*40,1, SPACELEFT+(x+1)*40,12, BkColor);
00091                 glcdSetColors(FgColor, BkColor);
00092             }else{
00093                 glcdSetColors(FgColor, ShColor);
00094             }
00095             uint8_t w = glcdCharsWidth(menu_mains[x].name, 0);
00096             glcdMoveTo(SPACELEFT+21+x*40 - w/2, 2);
00097             printf(menu_mains[x].name);
00098         }
00099     }
00100 }

00104 void disp_prop(void){
00105     static int8_t main_old = 0;
00106     static int8_t prop_old = 0;
00107     static int8_t value_old = 0;
00108 
00109     if( menu_now != main_old ||
00110         MENU_CURRENT_PROP_NR != prop_old ||
00111         MENU_PROP_NOW.current_value != value_old){
00112 
00113         main_old = menu_now;
00114         prop_old = MENU_CURRENT_PROP_NR;
00115         value_old = MENU_PROP_NOW.current_value;
00116 
00117         #define DISP_PROP_W 33
00118         glcdFillRect(0, 162, 132, 176, ShColor);
00119         for(uint8_t x=0; x < 3; x++){
00120             if(x == 1){
00121                 glcdFillRect(SPACELEFT+x*DISP_PROP_W,163, SPACELEFT+(x+1)*DISP_PROP_W,174, BkColor);
00122                 glcdSetColors(FgColor, BkColor);
00123             }else{
00124                 glcdSetColors(FgColor, ShColor);
00125             }
00126             int8_t current_value = value_old-1+x;
00127             char *label;
00128             if(current_value < 1)
00129                 label = "=>";
00130             else if(current_value > MENU_PROP_NOW.nr_values)
00131                 label = "<=";
00132             else
00133                 label = MENU_PROP_NOW.value_name[current_value-1];
00134             uint8_t w = glcdCharsWidth(label, 0);
00135             glcdMoveTo(SPACELEFT+21+x*DISP_PROP_W - w, 164);
00136             printf(label);
00137 
00138             //prop-name
00139             w = glcdCharsWidth(MENU_PROP_NOW.prop_name, 0);
00140             glcdFillRect(132 - 2*SPACELEFT - w, 163, 130, 174, BkColor);
00141             glcdSetColors(FgColor, BkColor);
00142             glcdMoveTo(132 - SPACELEFT - w, 164);
00143             printf(MENU_PROP_NOW.prop_name);
00144         }
00145     }
00146 }

00148 #ifdef DISP_SPLASH
00149     void disp_load_bitmap(void){
00150         uint8_t data = 0;
00151         uint8_t pixel[3];
00152 
00153 //      glcdSetAddr(0,0, 131, 175);   // set RAM access pointer of display
00154         glcdSetAddr(0,0, width, height);   // set RAM access pointer of display
00155 
00156         //width and height also defined in header
00157         for(uint8_t x = 0; x < width; x++){
00158             for(uint8_t y = 0; y < height; y++){
00159                 data = pgm_read_byte(&header_data[y*width + x]);
00160                 HEADER_PIXEL(data, pixel);
00161                 glcdPutPixel(RGB(pixel[0], pixel[1], pixel[2]));
00162             }
00163         }
00164     }
00165 #endif
00166 
00167 void disp_clean(void){
00168     glcdSetAddr(0,0, 131, 175);   // set RAM access pointer of display
00169     //glcdSetBkColor(BkColor);
00170 
00171     //width and height also defined in header
00172     for(uint8_t x = 0; x < 132; x++){
00173         for(uint8_t y = 0; y < 176; y++){
00174             glcdPutPixel(BkColor);
00175         }
00176     }
00177 }

00189 void disp_debugging(void) {
00190     glcdSetColors(WHITE,BkColor);
00191 
00192     static uint16_t count = 0;
00193     int8_t y = 30;
00194     glcdMoveTo(20,y+=11); printf(" Count: %d    \n",count++);
00195     glcdMoveTo(20,y+=11); printf(" Menue: %d    \n",(uint16_t)ADCSRA);
00196     glcdMoveTo(20,y+=11); printf(" Presc: %d    \n",(uint16_t)(ADCSRA & ADIF));
00197     glcdMoveTo(20,y+=11); printf(" spi_control: %d   \n",SPCR);
00198     glcdMoveTo(20,y+=11); printf(" spi_status: %d   \n",SPSR);
00199 }

00203 void disp_terminal(void) {
00204 //  if(glcd_Cursor.X < 5 || glcd_Cursor.Y < 16 || glcd_Cursor.Y > 162) glcdMoveTo(5,16);
00205     if(glcd_Cursor.X < 5 || glcd_Cursor.Y < 16 || glcd_Cursor.Y > 162 || glcd_Cursor.X > 100) glcdMoveTo(5,16);
00206     glcdSetColors(WHITE,BkColor);
00207 
00208     uint16_t rx_data;
00209     while(! ((rx_data=uart_getc()) & UART_NO_DATA)){
00210         //glcdPut(rx_data & 255);
00211         glcdDrawChar((uint8_t)rx_data);
00212     }
00213     while(! ((rx_data=uart1_getc()) & UART_NO_DATA)){
00214         //glcdPut(rx_data & 255);
00215         glcdDrawChar((uint8_t)rx_data);
00216     }
00217 
00218 //  if(glcd_Cursor.X < 5 || glcd_Cursor.Y < 16 || glcd_Cursor.Y > 162 || glcd_Cursor.X > 120) glcdMoveTo(5,16);
00219     //printf("%c",(rx_data & 255));
00220 
00221     //glcdWait(100);
00222 }

00226 void disp_graph(void) {
00227     if(adc_stopped() == 0) return;
00228 
00229     #define GR_W    16  //width of single box
00230     #define GR_H    16  //height of single box
00231     #define GR_WW   8   //number of boxes on horizontal axis
00232     #define GR_HH   9   //number of boxes on vertical axis
00233     #define GR_X    2   //x-coord: upper-left
00234     #define GR_Y    15  //y-coord: upper-left
00235 
00236 
00237     //trigger
00238     uint8_t trigger_shift = GR_H*adc_channels;
00239     uint16_t GR_TRIG_BEFORE = ADC_BUF_SIZE - (GR_HH*GR_H*adc_channels) + trigger_shift;
00240 
00241     int8_t trigger_old = 0;
00242     int8_t trigger_new = 0;
00243     int8_t trigger_highest = 0;
00244     uint16_t offset = 0;
00245 
00246     for(uint16_t x = trigger_shift; x < GR_TRIG_BEFORE; x+=adc_channels){
00247         trigger_old = adc[x] >> 1;
00248         trigger_new = adc[x + 3*adc_channels] >> 1;
00249         if((trigger_new-trigger_old) > trigger_highest){
00250             offset = x - trigger_shift;
00251             trigger_highest = trigger_new-trigger_old;
00252         }
00253     }
00254 
00255     //draw in the display
00256     disp_drawGrid(&adc[offset]);
00257 
00258     adc_init(1);
00259 }
00260 
00263 void disp_drawGrid(volatile uint8_t toDraw[]){
00264     //draw grid
00265     glcdSetColors(ShColor, BkColor);
00266     for(uint8_t x = GR_X; x <= GR_X+GR_WW*GR_W; x+=GR_W) glcdLine(x, GR_Y, x, GR_Y+GR_HH*GR_H);
00267     for(uint8_t y = GR_Y; y <= GR_Y+GR_HH*GR_H; y+=GR_H) glcdLine(GR_X, y, GR_X+GR_WW*GR_W, y);
00268 
00269     //replot data
00270     //init
00271     static uint8_t buffer[4][GR_H*GR_HH];
00272     uint8_t old_coord[4] = {buffer[0][0], buffer[1][0], buffer[2][0], buffer[3][0]};
00273     static uint8_t old_adc_nr_channels = 1;
00274     for(uint8_t ch=0; ch < adc_channels; ch++)
00275         buffer[ch][0] = toDraw[ch] >> 1;
00276     glcdSetBkColor(BkColor);
00277     //start
00278     for(uint8_t y = 1; y < GR_H*GR_HH; y++){
00279         //erase old lines
00280         glcdSetFgColor(BkColor);
00281         for(uint8_t ch=0; ch < old_adc_nr_channels; ch++){ //old_number!!!
00282             glcdLine(GR_X + old_coord[ch], y-1 + GR_Y, GR_X + buffer[ch][y], y + GR_Y);
00283             old_coord[ch] = buffer[ch][y];
00284             buffer[ch][y] = toDraw[y*adc_channels+ch] >> 1;
00285         }
00286         //draw new lines
00287         for(uint8_t ch=0; ch < adc_channels; ch++){
00288             switch(ch){
00289                 case 0:
00290                     glcdSetFgColor(WHITE);
00291                     break;
00292                 case 1:
00293                     glcdSetFgColor(FgColor);
00294                     break;
00295                 case 2:
00296                     glcdSetFgColor(GREEN);
00297                     break;
00298                 case 3:
00299                     glcdSetFgColor(RED);
00300                     break;
00301             }
00302             glcdLine(GR_X + buffer[ch][y-1], y-1 + GR_Y, GR_X + buffer[ch][y], y + GR_Y);
00303         }
00304     }
00305     old_adc_nr_channels = adc_channels;
00306 
00307     //info box
00308     #define INFO_X GR_X+GR_W*(GR_WW-3) + 1
00309     #define INFO_Y GR_Y+GR_H*(GR_HH-2) + 1
00310     //glcdFillRect(INFO_X, INFO_Y, INFO_X + GR_W*2 - 2, INFO_Y + GR_H*2 - 2, BkColor);
00311     glcdSetColors(FgColor, BkColor);
00312     int y = INFO_Y - 9;
00313     glcdMoveTo(INFO_X+2, y+=11); printf("td:");
00314 //  glcdMoveTo(INFO_X+2, y+=11); printf("o:");
00315     y = INFO_Y - 9;
00316     glcdMoveTo(INFO_X+10, y+=11); printf(" %6d ",(int16_t)(adc_duration*GR_H));
00317 //  glcdMoveTo(INFO_X+10, y+=11); printf(" %6d ",(int16_t)(toDraw-adc));
00318 }
